alert.note: Alert for Deuel; Garden; Sheridan (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Watch issued May 12 at 2:49AM CDT until May 12 at 2:27PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM MDT EARLY THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues to be possible. * WHERE...A portion of panhandle Nebraska, including the following counties, Deuel, Garden and Sheridan. * WHEN...Until 6 AM MDT early this morning. * IMPACTS...Excessive runoff may result in flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations. Creeks and streams may rise out of their banks. Flooding may occur in poor drainage and urban areas. Storm drains and ditches may become clogged with debris. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - Any additional showers or thunderstorms early this morning may cause flooding. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be alert for possible Flood Warnings. Those living in areas prone to flooding should be prepared to take action should flooding develop.
